summary.para: Specifies the state of a tree item. These values are used by methods of the interface.

remarks.para: The NSTCFOLDERCAPABILITIES type is defined in Shobjidl.h beginning in Windows 7.

summary.para: The property does not exist. Filtering is not supported.
Property exists. Supports filtering based on the value specified in System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree.
Delays registration for change notifications until the tree is expanded in the navigation pane.
